summary: Expose delegation and handoff as MCP tools rather than removing dead CoordinationEngine code
context: CoordinationEngine is fully implemented and tested but has no MCP tool surface. Only twining_agents is exposed. User chose to expose rather than defer.
rationale: Code is already written, tested, and the engine is constructed at startup. Exposing it completes the coordination feature set and eliminates the dead-code smell. Removing would waste existing work.
